author: Quint Forgey
title: Atlanta mayor 'at a loss' over Georgia governor's move to reopen state economy
description: Certain businesses in the state could reopen as early as Friday.
content:
"I've spoken with several leaders across this state," she said. "So we really are at a loss, and I am concerned as a mother and as the mayor of our capital city."
The mayor's remarks came after Kemp said earlier Monday that certain businesses in Georgia shut… [+919 chars]
